name: Spar Sets
description:
These are our sets. This means that various individual products are sold together (only in this
configuration) and are therefore cheaper than if they were bought individually.
Each set has a different product and requires a different number of images.
A picture is always minimal.
The maximum number is listed under each set.

name: Favoriten
description:
These products are all individual so not a package/set.
However, there are variants for the sizes or any additional options.

name: Einzelprodukte
description:
These products are all individual products, which means it is not a package/set. The customer
must be able to choose one image at a time
